resources.string: 2.Now enter the quantity for each bill in the quantity area(middle area of input field).
3.After entering the cash count details. Tap "Continue".
4.Search RequestName by entering the name of employer and Tap Search Button "üîç" then select the employer name.
5.Before sending cash count make sure the following fields are not empty.
To Manually enter the device IMEI.
1.Tap the Imei input field and enter the IMEI of a device.
2.Tap and enter the remarks you want to put in the remarks field.
1.Tap the barcode icon to Scan device IMEI code.
2.After scanning device IMEI code. The IMEI will be automatically put on the Imei Input field.
